metadata.title: CVE-2022-22744 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The constructed curl command from the "Copy as curl" feature in DevToolswas not properly escaped for PowerShell. This could have lead to commandinjection if pasted into a Powershell prompt.
*This bug only affectsThunderbird for Windows. Other operating systems are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 91.5, Firefox < 96, and Thunderbird <91.5.

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
